Pig.notes:
Stand Name: Massive Attack
AC 11 SAC 17

actions.Quarter Staff: Melee Weapon Attack: reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d8+1) blunt damage.
actions.Bird Call Staff: Melee Weapon Attack: reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d8+1) blunt damage.
actions.Summon Fey: Summons 2 fey creatures. Rolling a 2d6 to determine the creatures summoned.
actions.Eldritch Blast: Ranged Weapon Attack: range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d10) force damage.

SirinGalanodel.notes:
Dark Elf Sorcerer
Spell Mod: +4
Spell Save DC: 12

skills.Fey Ancestry: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.
skills.Sunlight Sensitivity: Disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.
skills.Trance: Meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day. (The Common word for such meditation is 'trance.') While meditating, you can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. After resting in this way, you gain the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.
skills.Wild Magic Surge: Roll a d20 after casting a spell of 1st level or higher. On a 1, roll on the Wild Magic Surge table to create a random magical effect.
skills.Tides of Chaos: Gain advantage on one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw. After using this feature, roll on the Wild Magic Surge table to create a random magical effect.

actions.Quarter Staff: Melee Weapon Attack: reach 5 ft., one target. AtkBonus+1 (1d8+1) blunt damage.
actions.Dagger: Melee Weapon Attack: reach 5 ft., one target. AtkBonus+1 (1d4+1) piercing damage.
actions.Infestation: The target must succeed on a constitution saving. On a failed save, the target takes 1d6 poison damage and moves 5 feet in a random direction. Roll a d4 for the direction: 1, north; 2, south; 3, east; 4, west.
actions.Poison Spray: The target must succeed on a constitution saving throw or take 1d12 poison damage.
actions.Blade Ward: Until the end of your next turn, you have resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by weapon attacks.
actions.Minor Illusion: Create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration (1 minute). The illusion also ends if you dismiss it as an action or cast this spell again.
actions.Dancing Lights: Create up to four torch-sized lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover in the air for the duration. You can also combine the four lights into one glowing vaguely humanoid form of Medium size.
actions.Ray of Sickness: A ray of sickening greenish energy lashes out toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 2d8 poison damage and must make a constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it is also poisoned until the end of your next turn.
actions.Mage Armour: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends. The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends if the target dons armor or if you dismiss the spell as an action.

skills.City Secrets: You know the secret patterns and flow to cities and can find passages through the urban sprawl that others would miss. When you are not in combat, you (and companions you lead) can travel between any two locations in the city twice as fast as your speed would normally allow.
skills.Trance: Meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day. (The Common word for such meditation is 'trance.') While meditating, you can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. After resting in this way, you gain the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.
skills.Mask of the Wild: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.
skills.Darkvision: Accustomed to twilit forests and the night sky, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
skills.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, you can deal an extra 1d6 damage to one creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll. The attack must use a finesse or a ranged weapon.

actions.shortsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.shortbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.dagger: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

skills.Talons: You are proficient with your unarmed strikes, which deal 1d6+str mod slashing damage on a hit.
skills.Archery: You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls you make with ranged weapons.
skills.Favoured Enemy: (Human, Dragonborn) You have advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks to track your favoured enemies, as well as on Intelligence checks to recall information about them.
skills.Natural Explorer: You are particularly familiar with one type of natural environment and are adept at traveling and surviving in such regions. When you make an Intelligence or Wisdom check related to your favored terrain, your proficiency bonus is doubled if you are using a skill that you're proficient in.
skills.Dueling: When you are wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with that weapon.
skills.Two Weapon Fighting: When you engage in two-weapon fighting, you can add your ability modifier to the damage of the second attack.

actions.longbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.shortsword x2: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

skills.Stones Endurance: When you take damage, you can use your reaction to roll a d12. Add your Constitution modifier to the number rolled, and reduce the damage by that total. After you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.
skills.Powerful Build: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.
skills.Mountain Born: You're acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000 feet. You're also naturally adapted to cold climates, as described in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide.
skills.Rage: In battle, you fight with primal ferocity. On your turn, you can enter a rage as a bonus action. While raging, you gain the following benefits if you aren't wearing heavy armor: You have advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws. When you make a melee weapon attack using Strength, you gain a bonus to the damage roll that increases as you gain levels as a barbarian, as shown in the Rage Damage column of the Barbarian table. You have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

actions.Greataxe: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.Hand Axe: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: + (6 | 4) to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + (4 | 2) slashing damage.
actions.Javelin: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: + (6 | 4) to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + (4 | 2) piercing damage.

CN.notes:
Genasi Artificer
Spell Mod: +5
Spell Save DC: 13

skills.Darkvision: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. Your ties to the Elemental Plane of Fire make your darkvision unusual: everything you see in darkness is in a shade of red
skills.Fire Resistance: You have resistance to fire damage.
skills.Reach to the Blaze: You know the Produce Flame cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the Burning Hands spell once with this trait as a 1st-level spell, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
skills.Magical Tinkering: You have learned how to invest a spark of magic into mundane objects. To use this ability, you must have tinker's tools or other artisan's tools in hand. You then touch a Tiny nonmagical object as an action and give it one of the following magical properties of your choice: The object sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet. Whenever tapped by a creature, the object emits a recorded message that can be heard up to 10 feet away. You can cast the light cantrip on an object or a section of wall no larger than 5 feet in any dimension. You can have up to three non-instantaneous magical effects created by this feature active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

actions.Quarter Staff: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d6 (8)+1) blunt damage.
actions.Sling: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d4+1) blunt damage.
actions.Light Crossbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d8+1) piercing damage.
actions.Produce Flame: You can attack with a flame that you can hold in your hand. Make a ranged spell attack against a creature within 30 feet of you. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 fire damage. The spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

actions.Potion: Uncanny Reactions - Allows a reaction to be taken to any opponent's action (1 round)
potion of resist: takes 1d8 less damage (1 round)

actions.Keep Faith: Pray to the gods to add a 1d2 to any roll (bonus action)

actions.Poison Applied: poison tips: arrows deal poison damage. Target must pass a constitution check DC 12
actions.Potion: Attribute Whispers Pick any atttibute (strength, dexterity, constitution, intelligence, wisdom, charisma) and increase it by 1d (attribute total). Lasts 1 round.
potion of amplified healing: 1d % current dmg + 5

actions.Guiding Bolt: 4d6 radiant damage. Half damage if faith check failed. DC 15
actions.Potion: Absconded stars - Regain Spell slots (uses) equal to 1d (maximum spell slots)
Tether - Any damage you take is also dealt to the attacker. Any damage the attacker takes it also dealt to you. Lasts 2 rounds.
actions.Net: Restrain target (5ft range) target can dodge with a dex check DC 10, target must pass a strength check to escaped. DC 12

actions.Potion: Encased Stone: armour class increased by 1d (AC / 2). Lasts 2 round
